is.hello.go99.animators

Class AnimatorContext.Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • is.hello.go99.animators.AnimatorContext.Transaction
  • Enclosing class:
    AnimatorContext

    public static class AnimatorContext.Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    A pending collection of animators that will be run together within a containing animator context.
    See Also:
    AnimatorContext.transaction(AnimatorTemplate, int, TransactionConsumer, OnAnimationCompleted)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      AnimatorContext animatorContext
      The animator context the transaction belongs to.
      AnimatorTemplate template
      The template to apply to transaction animators, if non-null.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transaction(AnimatorContext animatorContext, AnimatorTemplate template)
      Construct a transaction with an animator context and template.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MultiAnimator animatorFor(android.view.View view)
      Creates a MultiAnimator for a given view, configuring it according to the transaction's template (if applicable), and starting it together with all other animations contained in the transaction.
      void cancel()
      Immediately terminates any running animators in the transaction, and makes all future calls to start() no-ops.
      boolean isRunning()
      Whether or not the transaction is currently running.
      void start()
      Immediately start the animations in the transaction if the transaction hasn't been canceled.
      <T extends android.animation.Animator>
      T      		 takeOwnership(T animator, java.lang.String name)
      Takes ownership of a given animator, configuring it according to the transaction's template (if applicable) and starting it together with all other animations contained in the transaction.
      android.animation.Animator toAnimator()
      Converts the transaction into a compound animator that will play all transaction animations together.

    • Field Detail

      • animatorContext

        public final AnimatorContext animatorContext
        The animator context the transaction belongs to.

      • template

        public final AnimatorTemplate template
        The template to apply to transaction animators, if non-null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(AnimatorContext animatorContext,
                   AnimatorTemplate template)
        Construct a transaction with an animator context and template.

        Should not be called directly unless creating a new subclass.

        Parameters:
        animatorContext - The context the transaction belongs to.
        template - The template to apply to animators added to the transaction.
        See Also:
        AnimatorContext.transaction(AnimatorTemplate, int, TransactionConsumer, OnAnimationCompleted)

    • Method Detail

      • animatorFor

        public MultiAnimator animatorFor(android.view.View view)
        Creates a MultiAnimator for a given view, configuring it according to the transaction's template (if applicable), and starting it together with all other animations contained in the transaction.

        The returned animator belongs to the transaction, making modifications to it after the transaction consumer returns is undefined.

        Parameters:
        view - The view to create an animator for.
        Returns:
        An animator for view.

      • takeOwnership

        public <T extends android.animation.Animator> T takeOwnership(T animator,
                                                              java.lang.String name)
        Takes ownership of a given animator, configuring it according to the transaction's template (if applicable) and starting it together with all other animations contained in the transaction.

        The passed in animator belongs to the transaction, making modifications to it after the transaction consumer returns is undefined.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the animator.
        Parameters:
        animator - The animator to take ownership of.
        name - The name of the animator.
        Returns:
        The passed in animator.
        See Also:
        if you need a {@link MultiAnimator}.

      • toAnimator

        public android.animation.Animator toAnimator()
        Converts the transaction into a compound animator that will play all transaction animations together.

        If the transaction contains only one animation, that animation will be configured against the template (if specified) and returned by this method.

        Returns:
        An animator owned by the transaction.

      • start

        public void start()
        Immediately start the animations in the transaction if the transaction hasn't been canceled.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Immediately terminates any running animators in the transaction, and makes all future calls to start() no-ops.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Whether or not the transaction is currently running.
        Returns:
        true if the transaction is running; false otherwise.
